 We believe that nothing — especially not your hair — should hold you back from breaking a sweat. Our formulas are specially designed for active women, using the power of nature to remove sweat, balance moisture, and help you transition from your workout to whatever’s next. A 1-hour workout is only 4% of the day — but for many women, breaking a sweat means sacrificing beauty and personal style in the other 96%. Whether you go from deadlifts to date night, happy hour after a HIIT workout, or running miles between meetings, SUNDAY II SUNDAY has you covered with products that celebrate your active lifestyle and help you bounce back.   For our founder Keenan Beasley, it’s not either or; it’s both. Inspired by the active women in his family and a passion for solving problems, Keenan built the first and only haircare brand dedicated to women who sweat. Please note that due to the costs associated with shipping and handling, we do not accept orders under $50. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.

Your cart is empty Minimum order requirement: $50.
 Sweat is great for cooling off our bodies after a good workout. Once the workout is done, sweat has done its job and it’s time to remove sweat from our scalp. Post-workout, sweat and our natural scalp oils combine. This combination causes our scalp to lose moisture and experience acidity (pH) changes. When this combo trickles down to our hair strands our hair can become dry, brittle, and frizzy because our hair shaft swells and our hair cuticles open. We can remove this sweat, scalp oil combo with a wash, but sometimes there just isn’t time for a full wash day. Meet  , the haircare line for active women that cares for your hair and scalp pre, post, and during your workout. Once you're done with your sweat session give   a good shake and apply it to your scalp to rid your scalp of post workout sweat. This sweet smelling combination of apple cider vinegar and micellar water clears dirt and sweat from the scalp, balances your scalp’s pH, and neutralizes odor causing bacteria. No more funny smelling gym hair or sweaty scalp. Need a targeted scalp treatment during your recovery days? Get a healthier scalp in 28 days with   Daily Scalp Serum. It’s made with peppermint oil and a patent-pending antioxidant, botanical extract that reduces inflammation and relieves itch in 15 minutes. It penetrates the scalp quickly making it perfect for all hair styles including braids, locs and twists. Now that you’ve gently cleansed, it’s time to moisturize your hair and get your style back with  . It coats the hair strands with natural botanical extracts and antioxidants to restore moisture lost due to sweat. A few sprays will refresh curls, reduce frizz, and restore shine so you can go about your post-workout day with your hair just the way you like. Hair on the edges of your scalp is the most fragile. Tension from ponytails and protective styles can cause your edges to thin or can create bald spots in other parts of your hair. Protect those edges by applying   to your hairline prior to your headband or hat. It’s made with biotin, coconut, sunflower seed, and safflower seed oils that protect, moisturize, and promote hair growth.  - 8.4oz Signature Scalp Balancing Scrub - 12oz Signature Scalp Balancing Shampoo - 12oz Signature Replenishing Conditioner - 1  SUNDAY II SUNDAY seamless acetate wide-tooth shower comb  - 2 SUNDAY II SUNDAY acetate claw clips - 1 SUNDAY II SUNDAY smooth turban-style t-shirt towel - 1 SUNDAY II SUNDAY deluxe zipper tote bag - Gently loosens buildup and residue on the scalp to help clear clogged follicles - Strengthens the scalp’s natural protective barrier - Soothes and nourishes dry, itchy scalp - pH balanced to support a healthy scalp barrier - Eliminates odor and irritation-causing bacteria - Reduces scalp inflammation caused by sweat and buildup - Provides antibacterial and anti-inflammatory protection to the scalp - Deeply penetrates the hair to restore and strengthen from within - Neutralizes the drying impact of sweat on the hair and scalp• Smooths and seals cuticle for stronger, more moisturized hair - Active Recovery Complex restores scalp health, fights inflammation, and reverses the signs of damage with barrier-strengthening botanicals - Seamless acetate wide-tooth shower comb for snag-free detangling - Two sleek acetate claw clips that make sectioning hair a breeze - Smooth turban-style t-shirt towel for gentle, frizz-free drying and plopping - Deluxe zipper tote to stash your hair spa goodies in style Start by gently massage   into wet scalp with your fingertips using a circular motion. Rinse hair thoroughly with warm water and follow with our  , focusing on the scalp. Rinse thoroughly and continue to  , distributing from roots to ends. Leave on for at least 2 minutes, rinse, and continue to your desired style.  Scalp is skin, and this dual-exfoliating pre-shampoo scrub uses papaya extract and sugar crystals to gently break down and buff away sweaty buildup for a healthier-looking, renewed scalp. • Gently loosens buildup and residue on the scalp to help clear clogged follicles • Strengthens the scalp’s natural protective barrier • Soothes and nourishes dry, itchy scalp • Helps reduce scalp inflammation caused by sweat • Papaya extract naturally exfoliates by dissolving proteins that bind dead skin to the scalp • Sugar crystals loosen and lift scalp buildup • Peppermint oil cools and soothe the scalp, helping to reduce flaking • Provides a relaxing exfoliating sensation on the scalp • Active Recovery Complex restores scalp health, fights inflammation, and reverses the signs of damage with barrier-strengthening botanicals Gently massage into wet scalp with your fingertips using a circular motion. Rinse hair thoroughly with warm water. For maximum scalp balancing benefits, use along with our Signature Scalp Balancing Shampoo and our Signature Replenishing Conditioner.  - Neutralizes and removes sweat, oil, and odors - No-rinse formula makes hair look, feel, and smell clean - Alternative to dry shampoo with no benzene, powdery residue, or drying alcohols - Actually cleans the hair and scalp, extending time between washes - Made with 96% natural ingredients - Fresh-scented  - Removes product buildup and excess oils without stripping your hair or clogging your pores - For all hair types - Locking spray nozzle for easy carrying in gym bag -Shake well to activate -Spritz evenly on hair and scalp -Gently massage scalp to evenly distribute and activate micelles -Use a hair-friendly towel to wipe away excess product -Follow with Revive Me Daily Moisturizing Spray to hydrate and add shine -Blow-dry as needed (optional)  - Micellar Water attracts and removes sweat and buildup from hair and scalp  - Apple Cider Vinegar balances scalp pH and minimizes bacterial growth  - Green Tea Extract to slow premature aging and inflammation Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Methyl Gluceth-20, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Commiphora Myrrha Resin Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Allantoin, Lauryl Methyl Gluceth-10 Hydroxypropyldimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Trioleate, Vinegar (Acetum), Polysorbate 20, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum). • Clean  • Vegan • Cruelty Free  • 96% Natural  • Silicone Free  • Paraben Free  • Gluten Free  • No Mineral Oil  Please note that due to the costs associated with shipping and handling, we do not accept orders under $50.  Finally, a wash day system that works as hard as you do! Our Signature Scalp Balancing Scrub, Signature Scalp Balancing Shampoo, and Signature Replenishing Conditioner get your scalp and strands in shape with powerful botanicals that that cleanse, nourish, and protect after a week of intense sweat sessions. • Gently loosens buildup and residue on the scalp to help clear clogged follicles • Strengthens the scalp’s natural protective barrier • Soothes and nourishes dry, itchy scalp • pH balanced to support a healthy scalp barrier • Eliminates odor and irritation-causing bacteria • Reduces scalp inflammation caused by sweat and buildup • Provides antibacterial and anti-inflammatory protection to the scalp • Deeply penetrates the hair to restore and strengthen from within • Neutralizes the drying impact of sweat on the hair and scalp • Smooths and seals cuticle for stronger, more moisturized hair • Active Recovery Complex restores scalp health, fights inflammation, and reverses the signs of damage with barrier-strengthening botanicals Start by gently massage Signature Scalp Balancing Scrub into wet scalp with your fingertips using a circular motion. Rinse hair thoroughly with warm water and follow with our Signature Scalp Balancing Shampoo, focusing on the scalp. Rinse thoroughly and continue to Signature Replenishing Conditioner, distributing from roots to ends. Leave on for at least 2 minutes, rinse, and continue to your desired style.  Powerful enough to remove sweat and buildup from tough workouts, gentle enough for everyday use. This sulfate-free Scalp Balancing Shampoo relieves itch, dryness, and odor caused by sweat and free radicals while easing inflammation and rebuilding the scalp’s protective barrier. • Nourishing, non-stripping formula • pH balanced to support a healthy scalp barrier • Eliminates odor and irritation-causing bacteria •Reduces scalp inflammation caused by sweat and buildup •Soothes dry, itchy scalp • Supports antibacterial and anti-inflammatory protection on the scalp • Tamanu oil soothes, moisturizes, and nourishes the scalp • Probiotics minimize inflammation while promoting a healthy scalp barrier • Active Recovery Complex restores scalp health, fights inflammation, and reverses the signs of damage with barrier-strengthening botanicals • Sulfate-free and gentle enough for daily use For best results, shake well before use. Massage vigorously into scalp and wet hair, focusing on the scalp. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. For maximum scalp balancing benefits, use along with our Signature Scalp Balancing Sugar Scrub and our Signature Replenishing Conditioner.  For hair that’s as strong as you, this silicone-free Replenishing Conditioner nourishes and restores strands with key nutrients that repair damage and shield against breakage from ponytails, buns, hats, and other workout-related styles. • Softens, detangles, and strengthens in one step • Restores moisture to the scalp and hair barrier • Provides antibacterial and anti-inflammatory protection to the scalp • Reduces scalp inflammation caused by sweat and buildup • Deeply penetrates the hair to restore and strengthen from within • Neutralizes the drying impact of sweat on the hair and scalp • Smooths and seals cuticle for stronger, more moisturized hair • “Smart” Green Keratin targets and repairs weakened, damaged cuticles • Tamanu oil soothes, moisturizes, and nourishes the scalp • Probiotics minimize inflammation while promoting a healthy scalp barrier • Active Recovery Complex restores scalp health, fights inflammation, and reverses the signs of damage with barrier-strengthening botanicals • Extra slip for easy detangling Apply to wet hair from root to tip and leave in for at least 2 minutes.    100% Happiness Guarantee   We're not happy unless you're happy. It's that simple. Refunds will be credited to the original credit card used for payment.    To return items to mysunday2sunday.com, please follow these three easy steps:   1. Send an email to support@mysunday2sunday.com with your order number (if you don't have it—please specify your name and address) and items to be returned. Unfortunately, we are unable to refund your original shipping charges unless the return was a result of our error.   2. Pack and seal your return merchandise securely in the original package. The return must include the unused product; all original packaging, and documentation, which may have been included in the original shipment; the receipt; and a note containing your name, address, and reason(s) for return.   3. All return packages must be shipped via UPS, FedEx, USPS.         Please note that due to the costs associated with shipping and handling, we do not accept orders under $50.  There is nothing worse than your hair brushing the back of your neck mid-run. Not only is it uncomfortable, but it contributes to frizz and dryness by allowing friction and sweat to wreak havoc on the ends of your hair. Choose low impact styles (like a gently-tied high puff or low bun) to ensure constant tension is not being placed on the same parts of your hair.   Please note that due to the costs associated with shipping and handling, we do not accept orders under $50.  A double-dose of biotin to strengthen and nourish weak, thinning hair at the follicle and stimulate healthy regrowth. Edge Flourish Daily Nourishing Serum feeds and fortifies hair from the root with biotin, banana extract, sunflower seed oil, and Vitamin E. Extra-strength Hair Flourish Vegan Biotin Gummies help metabolize vital nutrients for keratin production. Together, this duo helps support healthy hair regrowth in areas with thinning caused by styling tension, breakage, and more. • Regrows thinning hair, including hairline, nape, and crown • Protection against tight ponytails, buns, and braids • Great for protective styles • Can be used as an overnight treatment • Biotin helps energize your workout • 5,000 mcg biotin per gummy • Helps metabolize nutrients for keratin production • Improves the look and health of your hair • Reduces shedding and thinning Twist nozzle and apply a few drops of Edge Flourish Daily Nourishing Serum directly to your edges, nape, or other thinning areas and gently massage.Take 2 gummies daily (10,000 mcg) as a dietary supplement or as directed by your healthcare professional. Do not exceed more than 8 gummies within a 24-hour period.
